roleset.name: say
roleset.note: EXPRESS-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Comparison with 'say'. Member of reflexive_appearance-48.1.2. (from express.01-v)

EXPRESSION-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to express.01. VN class reflexive_appearance-48.1.2. FN classes expressing_publicly and encoding. Framed by Katie. (from expression.01-n)

example.name: no hearer
example.text: Mr. Harper expressed confidence that he and Mr. Baum can convince the board of their worthiness to run the company.
example.arg: confidence that he and Mr. Baum can convince the board of their worthiness to run the company

example.name: Arg 0 in a pp
example.text: It had "expressions of interest of a transaction from both the borrowers and the banks," but didn't have an agreement
example.arg: from both the borrowers and the banks

example.name: Yes, this could be either arg 0 or arg 1, but the higher arg is going to trump the lower one.

roleset.name: send very quickly
roleset.note: EXPRESS-V NOTES: Member of VNcls send-11.1-1. (from express.02-v)

example.name: FedEx
example.text: John expressed his Christmas list to the North Pole.

roleset.name: biological expression (usually of a gene)
roleset.note: Based on AMR bio-medical annotation. Framed by Ulf and Katie. No VN class. This is a narrow sense. Both the noun and verb are consistent with FN class encoding but the class is too braod for this sense to function in all required situations.

example.name: Be careful! Genes are expressed via proteins, so when 'gene' or 'protein' is isn't explicitly mentioned this can be confusing!
example.text: The glucose-6 phosphatase gene is expressed in the human and rat small intestine.
example.arg: in the human and rat small instestine.

example.name: The gene causing the protein to be produced isn't explicitly mentioned here is implicitly understood
example.text: The steroid receptor RNA activator protein is expressed in breast tumor tissues
example.arg: The steroid receptor RNA activator protein

example.name: this frame can be used for more other biological expression
example.text: These data support the feasibility of chromosomal expression of a foreign antigen from multiple integration sites.
example.arg: of a foreign antigen from multiple integration sites.
